sentences.sContent: The magazine wrongly suggested he was a liar and a hypocrite.
sentences.sCn: 该杂志错误地暗示他是个骗子和伪君子。

remMethod.val: hypo (下面； 次等) + crite (批评者) → 在背后批评的人 → 伪君子

trans.tranOther: someone who pretends to have certain beliefs or opinions that they do not really have – used to show disapproval
